Original:

首先，太座提前訂位，時間是下午1點。雖然前一天已確認過訂位，但進入餐廳後，我們竟然在門口站了許久，沒有人來招呼。明明看到我們了，但前台的3位服務人員似乎忙得焦頭爛額，居然讓我們在門口尷尬地等候。不知道的人還以為我是貴餐廳的招財貓呢，哈哈！這家餐廳的評價如此高，怎麼會這樣勒？

點了幾道料理後，我們發現餐廳主廚確實用心。699元的萊姆伏特加小羔羊，肉質鮮嫩、口感飽滿，處理得非常不錯。399元的日本兵庫火烤生蠔（生食級），處理得也很好，吃得滿嘴都是新鮮的味道。其他如299元的鱒鮭腰果沙拉（新鮮生菜與鮭魚）、300元的牛肉薄皮披薩（鹹度較高且底部微焦），這些菜色其實都沒什麼好挑剔的！
如果要提出建議的話，貴餐廳既然賣酒賺錢，能否加強外場人員的教育訓練？今天我點了2份生蠔，想搭配白酒，結果你們上了一杯180元、酒體已經分散、只剩酒精雜味的House Wine。喝第一口時，我立刻反應希望更換，但服務人員可能誤解了，拿來一個小箱外觀（應該是鋁箔包裝），並告訴我這種酒可以耐放且絕對沒問題。身為消費者，我希望外場人員能更理解：當消費者提出問題時，你們應該針對問題提供解決方案，而不是草草了事！

最後，這頓飯我們2人共花費近3,000元。希望有機會再訪 貴餐廳時，你們能多一些耐心與細心，相信會做得更好！

First of all, Taiza binds ahead in advance at 1 pm.Although the reservation has been confirmed the day before, after entering the restaurant, we even stood at the door for a long time, and no one came to say hello.I saw us obviously, but the three service staff at the front desk seemed to be too busy, and it actually made us wait embarrassed at the door.People who do n’t know think I am a wealthy cat in your restaurant, haha!The evaluation of this restaurant is so high, how can it be like this?

After ordering a few cuisines, we found that the restaurant chef did be attentive.The 699 yuan Lym Vodka lamb, which is tender and full of taste, and has a good treatment.The 399 yuan Japan Hyogo fire roasted oyster (raw food grade) is also very good, and the mouth is full of fresh taste.Others such as 299 yuan salmon waist fruit salad (fresh lettuce and salmon), 300 yuan of beef -skinned pizza (high saltiness and slightly burnt at the bottom), these dishes are actually not very picky!
If you want to make suggestions, since your restaurant sells wine to make money, can you strengthen the education and training of the people outside the field?Today I ordered 2 oysters and wanted to match white wine. As a result, you put a cup of 180 yuan, the wine body was scattered, and only the scent of wine.When I drank the first bite, I immediately reacted to replace it, but the service staff may be misunderstood and brought a small box of appearance (it should be an aluminum foil packaging), and told me that this wine can be durable and absolutely no problem.As a consumer, I hope that the staff of the field can understand more: when consumers ask questions, you should provide solutions for problems, not hastily!
